description: While Benny (Lucas exclusive Ben Andrews) daydreams about smashing a pie in Alexanders face, assistant Christian (Lucas exclusive Christian Cruz) "accidentally" spills water on Bennys crotch. He sucks on the huge uncut shaft like a pro before whipping out a "You Gotta Be Kidding"-sized condom to get fucked around the room. Christian then eats the cum up!
title: Ben Andrews and Christian Cruz
